36 typedef enum flom_handle_state_e {
40  FLOM_HANDLE_STATE_INIT = 22,
44  FLOM_HANDLE_STATE_CONNECTED,
48  FLOM_HANDLE_STATE_LOCKED,
52  FLOM_HANDLE_STATE_DISCONNECTED,
57  FLOM_HANDLE_STATE_CLEANED
58 } flom_handle_state_t;
